#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	char out[1000];
	int num, i=0, k=0;
	
	while(i<10)
	{
		scanf("%d",&num);
		
		switch(num)
		{
			case 64: out[k++]='1';
			out[k++]='\n';
			break;
			
			case 128: out[k++]='4';
			out[k++]='\n';
			break;
			
			case 256: out[k++]='1';
			out[k++]='1';
			out[k++]='\n';
			break;
			
			case 512: out[k++]='2';
			out[k++]='8';
			out[k++]='\n';
			break;
			
			case 1024: out[k++]='6';
			out[k++]='8';
			out[k++]='\n';
			break;
			
			default: out[k++]='0';
			out[k++]='\n';
		}
		i++;
	}
	out[k]='\0';
	
	printf("%s", out);
	
	return 0;
}
